name: Reduce Opponent's Hand to 3
description: Next turn, your opponent's hand is reduced to 3

hooks.OnDrawPhase: while (OpponentHand.Count > 3) { var card = OpponentHand[OpponentHand.Count - 1]; OpponentHand.RemoveAt(OpponentHand.Count - 1); OpponentDiscard.Add(card); } Log(PlayerDisplayName + "'s hand is restricted to 3 cards!");
